mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_webtoon SET lastup = SYSDATE, isupdated = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT w.id, w.title, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(w.thumbnail1, 4000, 1) AS thumbnail1, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(w.thumbnail2, 4000, 1) AS thumbnail2, COUNT(j.tbl_webtoon_id) AS jjimCount, w.lastup, w.isUpdated, w.isAdult FROM tbl_webtoon w LEFT JOIN tbl_jjim j ON w.id = j.tbl_webtoon_id GROUP BY w.id, w.title, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(w.thumbnail1, 4000, 1), DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(w.thumbnail2, 4000, 1), w.lastup, w.isUpdated, w.isAdult ORDER BY jjimCount DESC, w.lastup DESC NULLS LAST, w.title ASC

SELECT w.id, w.title, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(w.thumbnail1, 4000, 1) AS thumbnail1, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(w.thumbnail2, 4000, 1) AS thumbnail2, COUNT(j.tbl_webtoon_id) AS jjimCount, w.lastup, w.isUpdated, w.isAdult FROM tbl_webtoon w LEFT JOIN tbl_jjim j ON w.id = j.tbl_webtoon_id WHERE w.updatedays LIKE '%' || #{day} || '%' GROUP BY w.id, w.title, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(w.thumbnail1, 4000, 1), DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(w.thumbnail2, 4000, 1), w.lastup, w.isUpdated, w.isAdult ORDER BY jjimCount DESC, w.lastup DESC NULLS LAST, w.title ASC
SELECT COUNT(j.tbl_webtoon_id) as jjimCount FROM tbl_webtoon w JOIN tbl_jjim j ON w.id = j.tbl_webtoon_id WHERE w.id = #{id} GROUP BY w.id
